name: Flexbones
description: Flexbones script running in a post Grunt world

scripts.compile-sass: node-sass --source-map true --output-style compressed assets/sass/style.scss style.css && autoprefixer style.css
scripts.build-js: npm run concat && npm run uglify-js
scripts.build-images: npm run svg-to-png && npm run optimise-images
scripts.watch: livereload & npm run watch-sass && npm run watch-js && npm run watch-html && npm run watch-php
